title: Lowest GDP per capita growth
description: In 2023, Sudan experienced a significant decline in GDP per capita growth, with a rate of -21.16%.

title: Lowest GNI per capita
description: Sudan's GNI per capita was one of the lowest in the world in 2023, at 308.45 constant LCU.

title: Lowest vitamin A supplementation coverage
description: In 2022, only 1% of children aged 6-59 months in Sudan received vitamin A supplementation.

title: Lowest total alcohol consumption per capita
description: In 2020, Sudan had one of the lowest total alcohol consumption rates per capita, at just 0.01 liters of pure alcohol.

title: Highest GDP deflator
description: Sudan had an extremely high GDP deflator in 2023, reaching 462,510.92, indicating significant inflation.
